overview: Akın goes to a deserted village of his childhood by the Black Sea, where his family lives, joined by his lover Elif and a small team, with whom he has been working for years to accomplish his movie. However, Akın finds himself in a big stalemate: On one hand, Elif gradually reveals her suppressed feelings that she has accumulated; on the other, his father on the verge of death although his movie waiting to be shot. The traumas that cannot be overcome in their relationship, the betrayals that cannot be forgotten, dozens of gangrenous problems and the invisible binding of these two restless souls will keep snowballing and throw both of them to unexpected places while filming. Beneath the wreck of their relationship, there exists the film they dedicate their lives to shoot and a dying father.
title: Beyond Seasons
